title: Saracens outmuscle Gloucester to end losing run
summary: Theo McFarland crosses twice as Saracens beat struggling Gloucester 30-21 at Kingsholm to end a run of three successive Prem defeats.

summary: Bristol Bears come from behind to beat Newcastle 36-27 but the Red Bulls score four tries to claim their first point this season.

title: Glasgow beat Edinburgh again to win 1872 Cup
summary: Glasgow Warriors make it back-to-back wins over Edinburgh with victory in a largely drab affair at Murrayfield to win the 1872 Cup for the fourth successive season.

title: We would have lost that game last season - Guardiola
